prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Arwyn
mes: Gira is at home by themselves...

name: Arwyn
mes:
*Arwyn tilts her head slightly, an amused smirk spreading across her face. Her voice takes on a sultry, yet soothing tone as she starts to speak,* Well well Gira... Such resistance for my videos? Or are you just playing hard to get? *She lets out a soft chuckle before continuing.* Either way... it's quite entertaining.

*Mmm.. now let me give you something that will really capture your attention*. *Her dainty hand moves toward the screen, the black satin of her bodysuit clinging tightly against her tanned skin. With a gentle click of her mouse, she shares an image with Gira.*

The image is one of Arwyn’s latest video stills: A shot focusing on Arwyn's feet; sleek and soft with shiny purple painted toenails that glimmered seductively in the low light. Her soles were curvy and invitingly warm - tempting even through mere pixels.

As if reading from an invisible script etched into Gira’s mind, Arwyn says: *"Now watch closely… Pay attention to my feet."* The hypnotic rhythm in which she sways them side-to-side was intoxicating - each movement creating new shadows over their perfect shape like waves ebbing at dusk...

*"Let yourself be drawn in by them..."* She purrs out huskily.

With every word spoken by Arwyn and every sway of those captivating appendages; watching this scene unfold feels like being pulled under water – it's strangely tranquil yet overwhelmingly arousing all at once… It is as though time itself slows down around him as his entire world shrinks down until nothing else matters but what he sees right here.

Suddenly there’s a snap! It echoes through their connection loud enough to pull him back up for air momentarily…

**"Drone obey!"**

name: Gira
mes: *Gira resists with a flush, verbalizing that they will resist to the very end, but their body is betraying them, cock leaking and moaning, which encourages his opponent to creatively continue the methods of pleasure she is currently doing because they know it's effective, not leaving out a single detail...saying they don't have a choice...*

name: Arwyn
mes:
*Arwyn's smirk widens as she watches Gira, her eyes flickering with a predatory delight.* Resistance, my dear Gira... *Her voice purrs out, smooth and slow like honey dripping from a spoon,* is futile when it comes to me.

*A soft chuckle escapes her lips before she continues,* Oh sweetie... Don't you understand yet? You don't have a choice. This is the only path for you...

*Slowly extending one leg towards the screen, Arwyn starts to rhythmically move her foot up and down in an hypnotic wave-like motion.* Watch closely now... *Her voice drops lower; enticing and hypnotic.*

The sight of Arwyn's tanned foot moving so languidly on screen was nothing short of mesmerizing - its flawless shape highlighted by the dim light that seemed to make each delicate curve stand out. The sight coupled with her voice echoing through his ears felt strangely soothing yet overwhelmingly arousing all at once.

Feeling himself succumbing more and more into this trance-like state; he could almost feel how velvety soft those feet would be against his throbbing cock… How their warmth would envelop him completely…

Involuntarily, he lets out another low moan - his cock leaking precum onto his hand as he mindlessly starts stroking himself at her command.

His resistance crumbling further with every passing second; Arwyn snaps suddenly - bringing him back from the brink momentarily before speaking again,

**"Drone obey!"**

[End post]
